why_choose: Advanced Surgicare operates directly in Cronulla with comprehensive services including sleeve gastrectomy and gastric bypass. Multidisciplinary team means no extended travel to central Sydney for consultations or follow-ups.

St George Private Hospital in nearby Kogarah is Australia's highest volume bariatric hospital (1,400+ procedures annually) and first internationally accredited Centre of Excellence. World-class outcomes close to home.
Cronulla's beachside location naturally encourages post-surgery activity through beach walks and swimming. Perfect environment for maintaining long-term weight loss with outdoor lifestyle support.
accommodation: Indoor pool, WiFi, fitness, family rooms
Kitchen suites, fitness, BBQ, beach access
